resources.string: What do you really know about our favorite search giant, Google? Test your knowledge about these fun facts and click SUBMIT below to see your results!
1) What did co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin originally name Google?
2) How many zeros are in a Google?
3) As part of their green initiative, Google regularly rents goats to mow the lawns of their Mountain View headquarters.
4) As of 2016, what are Googleâ€™s three closest search competitors by estimated unique monthly visitors?
100% correct! You are a true Google fan!
